Since the sole seeder seems to have run away, dont worry..You can download the remaining part of the file by simply downloading any torrent containing the same iso(same size)...just add the new torrent and replace the new iso image with the one that you have partly downloaded..A checking will be performed and the downloading will continue from where you were stuck...I have followed this technique and it is working...In any case as soon as i finish downloading the iso, i will seed it to the this tracker...So dont worry..
